attributes.action: Create a system for comparing earnings where the the total value is always shown. This would be similar to the APR system used to compare interest rates and would put a value on holiday entitlement, pensions, sick pay benefits, company cars etc..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Salary rates when quoted and compared in the press, when advertised or otherwise published are always misleading. The value of additional benefits such as public sector pensions or generous sick pay arrangements can be substantial and destroy any reasonable comparison between headline slary costs.
